meanings.definition: Situated or lying above or on top of something else.
meanings.sent1: The superlain book was on top of the desk.
meanings.sent2: The cat enjoyed sitting on the superlain shelf.
meanings.sent3: The superlain hat on the dog's head made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness was like a superlain cloud in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The superlain mountain stood tall against the horizon.

meanings.definition: To place or lay on top of something else.
meanings.sent1: She superlain the blanket over the sleeping child.
meanings.sent2: Please superlain the plate on the table carefully.
meanings.sent3: He superlain the toy on the highest shelf to tease the cat.
meanings.sent4: The stars superlain the night sky like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The chef would superlain the final touch on the masterpiece dish.

meanings.definition: To be positioned above or on top of something else.
meanings.sent1: The painting superlain above the fireplace caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The bird superlain on the branch chirped happily.
meanings.sent3: The superhero superlain on the building, ready to save the day.
meanings.sent4: Her voice superlain above the noise of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The moon superlain in the night sky, illuminating the darkness.
